name: Flying Plane (abdocraft138)
description:
This game is made only by one person (me), and I am new to Game-Development.

The background is the only thing that's an assest, while everything else (including the music) is made by me.

It was much fun making this game, It's a flappy-bird inspired game, and it is also my very first game.

Anyways, enjoy. :D

Controls :

Click your left mouse button to go up, click ONLY, if you hold than you'll go up one time and stop.

Bugs : 

The score system wasn't working perfectly...and now it works kinda of better, it still needs some working, but it gets the job done.
